kit.leader_skill: "Pure Saiyans" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +50%

super_attack.name: Death Punisher
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK; Seals Super Attack

passive_skill.name: Sinister Plot
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is an ally whose name includes "Broly" on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) ATK & DEF 100% up and launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack for 5 turn(s); (Once) Ki +3; (Once) ATK & DEF 180% up; (Once) "Pure Saiyans" Category allies' ATK, DEF & chance of performing a critical hit 25% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; Starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn: Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 25% up for allies whose names include "Broly" within the character's attacking turn; High chance of evading enemy's attack; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up as the 3rd attacker in a turn
